participant_1.background:
I spent more time climbing since I quit my job.
i can t live without my friends.
i will be on bed rest for the next 5 months.
I like to visit the website for the Humane Society because it has a lot of information about animal welfare issues and how to help animals in need.
I'm originally from a small town in the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.

participant_2.background:
I like to enjoy my meals, so I don't go to fast food restaurants very often.
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.
I have a lot of fond memories of playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i am a full time mom.
i have been married eight years.

content.text: Not bad, I'm on bed rest for the next 5 months due to an injury, but I'm trying to stay positive.
Oh no! I'm so sorry to hear that. What kind of injury?
I fell off a cliff while climbing.
That sounds really scary! I'm glad you're ok.
Thanks, me too. I've been spending a lot of time on the Humane Society website since I've been laid up.
Oh, that's interesting. Why is that?
I just love animals and I want to learn more about how to help them.
That's great! I'm sure your time on bed rest will be well-spent.
Thanks, I hope so too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends, go to the gym, and read.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests. What do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I especially love historical fiction and biographies.
That's cool. I like to read a lot of nonfiction, especially about history and science.
We should exchange book recommendations sometime
